page.title: 13EDUCATION-A HEAD RECALLS
page.content: Q-Which people stick in your mind and in what way? A-The first people are Roland Clark who was the founder of the school and Bishop Henderson himself. Q-How many people have come to this school? A-About eight hundred children and with adults about nine hundred. Q-How much has the school changed and in what ways? A-When I started in September 1974 there were about one hundred and seventeen children here and now there are about three hundred. Q-How long have you been headmaster of this school? A-Since it opened well actually I was headmaster before it opened because the school was opened it was opened in Sept.1974 and I was appointed just before Christmas 1973.
